content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to install the "tree" package on my computer using the command "sudo apt-get install tree" but received an error message stating that the shell command is not allowed. I then tried to install "iputils-ping" and ping Google with the command "sudo apt-get install -y iputils-ping && ping -c 5 google.com" but received the same error message. I then searched for running routes at Brno Reservoir using the command "google" and "browse_website" and found information on suitable running routes in the reservoir area and near Veveří Castle. I then tested my internet connection with the command "sudo apt-get install iputils-ping && ping -c 5 google.com" and "execute_python_code" and received successful results. Finally, I attempted to list files in "/usr/share/doc" with the command "list_files" but received an error message stating that the output was too much.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "/usr/share/doc/README"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: Error: read_file /usr/share/doc/README failed: no such file or directory', type='action_result')]
"""
